title: Appomattox Court House National Historical Park: Curriculum Materials
body: Curriculum Materials         Ranger Bert Dunkerly demonstrates firing a gun for students. NPS  Teachers- On this page you will find a variety of resources. Click on the following links in order to access documents, primary source activities, and ideas for engaging young people with history:  Teaching with Museum Collections Teaching with History Listed below are specific lesson plans available in pdf form. Just click on each link for extensive lesson plans which are aligned with state and national standards and include materials and extension activities. McLean House lesson plan Toys and Games lesson plan Home Front lesson plan Kitchen lesson plan  Click on the left for a printable Teacher Packet.  Questions concerning either program should directed to the park's education coordinator, Brandon Chamberlain by e-mail or phone, 434-352-8987 ext. 231
